pr_title: [#10351] Instructor session results page: allow entering editing mode directly

timeline.message: Add url param to allow entering edit mode directly

timeline.bodyText:
Lint check seems to be failing because of this

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  isEditable: isEditable,
          
          
            
                  isEditable,
timeline.author: madanalogy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -298,7 +300,7 @@ export class InstructorSessionEditPageComponent extends InstructorSessionBasePag
       isPublishedEmailEnabled: feedbackSession.isPublishedEmailEnabled,
 
       isSaving: false,
-      isEditable: false,
+      isEditable: isEditable,

timeline.bodyText: What happens when the param is non-existent? Will it set this.isEditingMode to null?
timeline.author: madanalogy

replies.bodyText: Good point. Thanks for pointing that out.
replies.author: niqiukun
